title: How We Confronted Some Serious Issues
description:
People can be nasty online and even IRL. This week, Tasia and Camo discuss their low points and how they eventually overcame it. Tasia spills the tea on her drug addiction stemming from serious self-esteem issues, how people would put her business on blast after obtaining Vine fame, and the background on her criminal charges beyond what you can Google.
Camo talks about how they used to steal (sometimes with mom) and party, which ultimately led to getting arrested and some less-than-fun-times. Plus, they both talk about how maybe internet culture is getting nicer and encourage all of you to make better decisions.
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube

Follow Tasia on TikTok
Follow Camo on TikTok
Follow Tasia on IG
Follow Camo on IG
Follow Camo on YouTube
